Android Drawables Maven Plugin

The android-drawables-maven-plugin was created to allow the generation of Android drawable artifacts from a SVG source. After originally using the Batik Maven Plugin to perform this task, I found the amount of configuration grew rapidly so I created the android-drawables-maven-plugin.

The source and issue tracker can be found on Github

Goals Overview

  • android-drawables-maven-plugin:static-resources rasterizes any SVGs resources.
  • android-drawables-maven-plugin:rasterize copies non SVG drawable files
  • android-drawables-maven-plugin:unpack unpacks the bitmap resources contained in one or more 'android-drawables' artifacts.
